basics.name: Leo Liang
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2024.

work.company: UH Manoa Management and Industrial Relations Department
work.summary: Student Assistant for the Management and Industrial Relations Department
highlights: Helped around the office. Organized paperwork, answered emails, mail and phone calls, sent out notices, and assisted the management and industrial relations department at UH Manoa.

volunteer.summary: Member of HKN, the Honor Society for Electrical Engineers
Member of the UH Drone Team image processing team which competes in the SUAS competition
highlights: Created an alphanumeric recognition model in order to read the characters on a target

awards.title: Mānoa Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to for undergraduate study for having a 3.8 GPA upon time of application to UH Mānoa.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Awarded to students who ended the semester with a 3.5 GPA or higher.
